participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Laid-back and friendly, Michael enjoys sharing his interests with others. He has a passion for classic rock and loves to talk about his favorite band.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is the who. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i have never been out of ohio. i work for our local supermarket. i've a cat named spook.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Energetic and ambitious, Emily thrives on challenges and enjoys pushing herself to new limits. She loves motivating others and sharing her passion for sports.
participant_2.background: gymnastics is my favorite sport. my favorite color is yellow. i workout four hours a day. i am a gold medalist olympian. i love italian food and garlic bread.
